data.name: radioButtonManualSpline.Text
data.value: Spline curve (L/R clicks: add/del points, double click: set mask)

data.name: radioButtonManualSpot.Text
data.value: Spot (Click: set a spot with selected shape and size)

data.name: groupBox1.Text
data.value: Horizontal (distance from direct spot) unit and range

data.name: checkBoxSendProfileToPDIndexer.Text
data.value: Send profile data to PDIndexer through Clipboard

data.name: checkBoxExtensionIMG.Text
data.value: *.img (Rigaku RAxis-V, Fuji BAS2000/2500, Fuji FDL or ITEX)

data.name: radioButtonTakeoverMask.Text
data.value: Take over the current mask state

data.name: numericBoxCameraLength1.ToolTip
data.value: Distance from sample to direct spot

data.name: buttonSetBackgroundImage.Text
data.value: Set the current image as background

data.name: label15.Text
data.value: (note: χ is azimuth angle defined by miscellaneous tab)

data.name: radioButtonSaveAtImageDirectory.Text
data.value: at the same directory of the image

data.name: label5.Text
data.value: (below parameter is valid when 'Draw Ring' is visible)

data.name: numericBoxCameraLength2.ToolTip
data.value: Distance from sample to direct spot

data.name: checkBoxTest.Text
data.value: Remove Kα2 (if Kα1 line is selected)

data.name: checkBoxCorrectPolarization.Text
data.value: Correct linear polarization (i.e., linear polarized → unpolarized)

data.name: radioButtonSetDirectoryEachTime.Text
data.value: at the chosen directory each time
